name: Dare Challenges
description: Fun dares for brave players - 300 points each!

dares.dare: Send a video of yourself dancing for at least 10 seconds!
Send a goofy photo of yourself - the sillier the better!
I'm sending an image - whoever makes the best meme from it wins the points!
Miss call your teacher on WhatsApp or any other calling app and send proof!
Draw the dragon from the Kryptix logo - whoever draws it the best wins!
